Plot: A young man who was sentenced to seven years in prison for robbing a post office ends up spending three decades in solitary confinement. During this time, his own personality is supplanted by his alter-ego, Charles Bronson.
Title: Bronson
Writer: Brock Norman Brock (screenplay), Nicolas Winding Refn (screenplay)
Actors: Tom Hardy, Kelly Adams, Luing Andrews, Katy Barker
tomatoConsensus: Undeniably gripping, Bronson forces the viewer to make some hard decisions about where the line between art and exploitation lies.
